      public Flight getFlightByID(int id) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Find a specific flight in the system by Flight ID
      Parameters:
      id - as Integer
      Returns:
      a Flight object with the corresponding ID
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if a flight with the specified ID could not be found

      Returns:
      a Customer object with the corresponding ID
      Throws:

    • addFlight

      public void addFlight(Flight flight) throws IllegalArgumentException, FlightBookingSystemException
      Add a flight to the list of flights in the system
      Parameters:
      flight - as Flight
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the flight has a duplicate ID to one already stored in the system
      FlightBookingSystemException - if a flight with the same flightNumber and departureDate is already in the system

    • removeFlight

      public void removeFlight(Flight flight) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Set a flight as removed
      Parameters:
      flight - as Flight
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the given flight cannot be found in the system

    • addCustomer

      public void addCustomer(Customer customer) throws IllegalArgumentException, FlightBookingSystemException
      Add a customer to the list of customers in the system
      Parameters:
      customer - as Customer
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if a customer with the same ID is already in the system
      FlightBookingSystemException - if a customer with the same email is already in the system

    • removeCustomer

      public void removeCustomer(Customer customer) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Removes a customer from the list of customers in the system
      Parameters:
      customer - as Customer
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the given customer cannot be found in the system
